name: Female Shopper
description: Female shopperis a minor character appearing inThe Last of the Red Hat Mamas. WhenHomeris trying to find a friend forMarge, he spotted the shopper at a grocery store. He begins whispering in the shoppers ear, much to her discomfort. She attempts to run away from Homer, but Homer runs towards her. As she is about to round a corner and lose Homer, she hits a pile of cans and is knocked unconscious.

description: He has made several appearances, mostly voiced byHank Azaria. name: Lyle Lanley
description: The "marks" in Lanley's con scheme were towns with a lot of money. Lanley would visit a town and make a sales pitch for his monorails. After the town bought the monorail, Lanley would open a monorail conductor's training school, which was really a farce and provided very little in the way of real training. He later appeared as back up on many other Krusty shows. When Krusty fakes his death, he was at his funeral. At the funeral, all of the sideshows, (exceptSideshow Bob) were there. name: Doug
description: Homer got Doug and his roommatesBenjaminandGaryto play a prank onSpringfield A&M, a rival school. They kidnapped A&M's mascot, a pig namedSir Oinks-A-Lot, and brought him back to Springfield University. Homer then got the pig drunk by splitting a case of malt liquor with him, and the pig passed out.Dean Petersonheard the noise from the pig falling over and caught the nerds red-handed with the drunken pig. Due to the influence of Sir Oinks-A-Lot'spowerful friends, Peterson was forced to expel ...

description: When theSpringfield Retirement Castleis shut down due to violations, Julius goes to pick up his father. He keeps calling his son Julius a dummy. Julius chuckles at this then gets sad.

name: Dr. Bartley
description: In 1890 London, women are being killed with swords in a series of unsolved murders. Eliza and her assistant Dr. Bartley trace the swords used back to industrialistC. Ebenezer Burns. They find him in an opium den, where he claims he lost all his opium. The next suspect in mind isHomer. The police arrest Homer and are about to hang him when Eliza finds the real murderer:Inspector Wiggum, whose eel pie-covered hand prints were all over a sword used to kill one particularwoman.

name: Killhammad Aieee
description: Killhammad Aieee stood several feet tall, walked on two legs, and had huge machine guns for arms. It was completely non-humanlike in appearance: Its body and head were combined into one main piece shaped approximately like aTruncated cubecut in half horizontally, to which the arms and legs were attached. The robot could also morph some parts of its body to serve non-combat purposes, such as making a chaise lounge.

name: Long-haired girl
description: The long-haired girl is often seen in the background in Bart's class and aroundSpringfield Elementary. Her hair is usually colored brown, but due to her status as a background character, it is also occasionally in other colors. She has never spoken.

name: Popcorn Mascot
description: It first appears whileCharles Montgomery Burnsmakes his appeal for an heir. When he finishes and says the feature presentation will begin, whispers tell him to do a dance/song for the lobby. While doing so, the mascots join him.

name: Stephen Hawking
description: He arrived inSpringfieldhoping to see the perfect utopia created by the local MENSA group who had taken control but was dismayed to see it was more of a "fruitopia". When the townspeople began destroying a gazebo, he flew in to rescueLisa, who was trapped within. As well as a propeller, he also has toothbrush and extending boxing glove (which he uses onSkinner) attachments. He later shares a beer withHomeratMoe's Tavernand plans to steal his "theory of a donut shaped universe", before using h...

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sonic the Hedgehogis the protagonist of the eponymous video game series, and has served asSega's company mascot since the release of his first game in 1991. Sonic's sidekick and best friend is named Miles "Tails" Prower, who is a two tailed fox. His first rival is Knuckles the Echidna. He has a troublesome self-proclaimed girlfriend named Amy Rose, who is trying to have a date with him despite his lack of interest. His nemesis is called Dr. Ivo Robotnik, who now goes by the name Dr. Eggman (o...

name: El Puerco's first girlfriend
description: El Puerco was playing the guitar outsideLe Petite Appétitwhen his girlfriend came to him and wanted to break up with him. However, El Puerco took her hand and she decided to stay with him, until she noticedanother girlholding his second hand.

name: Blazing Guy Actor
description: WhenBart SimpsonandMilhouse Van Houtenwere checking outJack Lassen's profile onFacelOOk, they see a video about the Blazing Guy event. Here, the actors tells the viewers about this annual event.

name: Mother Superior
description: AfterHomerleavesMaggieon the doorstep of the church, she takes Maggie in and raises her in the Church.Lisagoes in the church undercover to find Maggie and ends up solving a lot of clues to find out what the gem is. She is told by the Mother Superior that the gem is Maggie, not her, as Lisa thought it was her.Margethen takes Maggie from the Church. According to another Nun, she is very annoying because she always plays quarterback in football.

name: Hellroads faculty
description: Bart (as Beelzebart) was skinned for not having a "Hell pass". Soon after, when Bart wanted to become a fulltime student of the school, Homer and Marge were spoken to by the men. On the graduation ceremony day, the men read out a prepared speech, stating that Webster defines success before pointing out chained-up Noah Webster in the crowd. After Webster asked why he was there, the reply "You changed the "R-E" to "E-R" in "theater," I hate that!" was given. Then the two then announce Beezlebar...

name: Akira
description: As a young boy in Japan, Akira was a minor child-star on television. He spent four years playing the part of "Whitey" on "Let Trouble-Makey Beaver Do Himself." a Japanese sitcom inspired by a 1950's American TV show. As he grew older, acting jobs became scarce, so Akira enrolled in a cooking school. Upon graduation, he came to America and opened a restaurant in Springfield called "The Happy Sumo." In addition to the culinary arts, Akira practices the martial arts, teaching karate at the Sprin...

name: Mafia victim
description: Mafia victimis a non-speaking character appearing as a corpse inThe Simpsons Movie. When dumping in the lake is outlawed,Fat Tony,Legs, andLouieare seen attempting to hide his body in the lake. WhenChief Wiggumstates that dumping in the lake is outlawed. Fat Tony, referring to the corpse as "yard trimmings" states that he will dispose of it elsewhere. When Lou comments that he thinks Fat Tony has a corpse, Wiggum states he thought that until Tony referred to it as "yard trimmings".
